remarks: Equality of series under different addition operations which agree on an additively closed subset.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 21-Mar-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 25-Apr-2016.)
statement:
seqfeq3.m $e |- ( ph -> M e. ZZ ) $.
seqfeq3.f $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. ( ZZ>= ` M ) ) -> ( F ` x ) e. S ) $.
seqfeq3.cl $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. S /\ y e. S ) ) -> ( x .+ y ) e. S ) $.
seqfeq3.id $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. S /\ y e. S ) ) -> ( x .+ y ) = ( x Q y ) ) $.
seqfeq3 $p |- ( ph -> seq M ( .+ , F ) = seq M ( Q , F ) ) $.
$d .+ x y $.
$d F x y $.
$d M x y $.
$d Q x y $.
$d S x y $.
$d ph x y $.
